results.title: Captopril versus atenolol to prevent expansion rate of thoracic aortic aneurysms: rationale and design.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@Captopril@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to prevent expansion rate of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@thoracic aortic aneurysms@@@: rationale and design.

citations.NLM: Spartalis M, Tzatzaki E, Iliopoulos DC, Spartalis E, Patelis N, Athanasiou A, Paschou SA, Voudris V, Siasos G. Captopril versus atenolol to prevent expansion rate of thoracic aortic aneurysms: rationale and design. Future Cardiol. 2021 Mar;17(2):189-195. PMID: 32842783

results.title: An assessment of the current medical management of thoracic aortic disease: A patient-centered scoping literature review.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@Thoracic aortic aneurysm@@@ and @DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@dissection@@@ are complex diagnoses that require management by multidisciplinary providers using a variety of medical therapies, surgical interventions, and lifestyle modifications.

citations.NLM: Pena RCF, Hofmann Bowman MA, Ahmad M, Pham J, Kline-Rogers E, Case MJ, Lee J, Eagle K, Aortic Dissection Collaborative. An assessment of the current medical management of thoracic aortic disease: A patient-centered scoping literature review. Semin Vasc Surg. 2022 Mar;35(1):16-34. PMID: 35501038

results.title: Long-term doxycycline is more effective than atenolol to prevent thoracic aortic aneurysm in marfan syndrome through the inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase-2 and -9.
results.text_hl: ...Beta-blockers, eg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, are the cornerstone therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@thoracic aortic aneurysm@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@TAA@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan syndrome@@@; however, continued @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@aortic dilatation@@@ has been reported.

citations.NLM: Chung AW, Yang HH, Radomski MW, van Breemen C. Long-term doxycycline is more effective than atenolol to prevent thoracic aortic aneurysm in marfan syndrome through the inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase-2 and -9. Circ Res. 2008 Apr 25;102(8):e73-85. PMID: 18388324
